tasks.label: Git Sync & Rebase (repo)
args: git fetch --all --prune && git pull --rebase && git status -sb

tasks.label: Git Push (Fast-Forward)
args: git fetch origin main && if git merge-base --is-ancestor origin/main HEAD; then git push; else echo 'Remote main has new commits; run Git Sync & Rebase first.' >&2; exit 1; fi
